name: Creative Webcam Video Effects File
summary: Learn about .VFZ files and view a list of programs that open them.

windows.name: Open over 400 file formats with File Viewer Plus.Free Download

content: To add an effect, use the Advanced Video FX program within the Live! Cam software.

description: File used by Live! Cam, a program that allows users to chat online using Creative webcams; contains effects that morph or overlay video feeds; used to enhance social online chatting with fun and creative effects.
